body_html:
Can someone help me? I pretty new to this.
I already installed cuda9.0 and cudnn7.0 then found out that cuda 9 isn't supported by tensorflow 1.4 then I came across to this thread.
I've downloaded the whl and installed it using:
pip3 install tensorflow-1.4.0-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl
it says that it was successful but when I try to import tensorflow I get the following error:
ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

I can't just download the cuda 8 since it will take me 1/4 of my day because of slow internet connection :|

body:
Can someone help me? I pretty new to this.
I already installed cuda9.0 and cudnn7.0 then found out that cuda 9 isn't supported by tensorflow 1.4 then I came across to this thread.
I've downloaded the whl and installed it using:
`pip3 install tensorflow-1.4.0-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl`
it says that it was successful but when I try to import tensorflow I get the following error:
`ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`

I can't just download the cuda 8 since it will take me 1/4 of my day because of slow internet connection :|
